Description: Bowl. Inside, panel with figure of man,with nimbus,holding sword and divining rods,birds with palmettes. Made of black, blue, green, red underglaze pottery (white).
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Raqqa, OA register: "Said to be from Rakka".
Bibliographic references: Hobson 1932b / A Guide to the Islamic Pottery of the Near East (fig.29)
Lane 1947 / Early Islamic Pottery: Mesopotamia, Egypt and Persia (fig.79.A)
Akbarnia et al 2018 / The Islamic World: a History in Objects (p.112, fig.2)
